title: Natural Language Inference: for humans and machines
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A talk about inference in Natural Language, part of the Berkeley Seminar series.

title: Dialectica Petri Nets
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: This talk describes  joint work with Elena di Lavore and Wilmer Leal on Dialectica Petri Nets.

title: Dialectica and Kolmogorov Problems
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: Talk part of the 'Finding the Right Abstractions' Workshop 2021

title: Dialectica e os Problemas de Kolmogorov-Veloso
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: Talk in Portuguese, part of the celebrations for Carolina Blasio Day.

title: Going Without: A Linear Modality and FP
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A talk for MSFP (MathematicalSemantics of Programming Languages) on modal type theory.

title: Entre a cruz e a caldeirinha
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A talk in Portuguese about my career in NLP, for the colective 'Brasileiras no PLN'.

title: Tutorial: Constructive Modalities
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A tutorial about my kind of constructive modal logic, based on Curry-Howard, for the Australasian Association of Logic (AAL).

title: Dialectica Categorical Constructions
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A talk for JMM2023, which wasn't given by me after all. Thanks Charlotte Aten!

title: Relevant Dialectica Categories
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A talk about Dialectica categories for modelling relevant logic at the  MIT Category Theory Seminar.

title: Categorical Explicit Substitutions
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A categorical model for Explicit Substitutions.

title: Dialectica Categories for the Lambek Calculus
author: Valeria de Paiva
description: A talk about dialectica models of the Lambek calculus, Logic SuperGroup.
